title: Unable to click when in fullscreen mode
body: Im unable to click ones i join a battle or tutorial but otherwise i function normally and i want to play but cant and ive downloaded it today and already did the repair thing....

replies.body: It kinda sounds like something might be taking the focus of your windows away from League somehow. Try making sure nothing is running in the background that might be popping up, and if that doesn't go anywhere do me a favor and try running the game in borderless mode instead of fullscreen.
